long_description: Get the locked-in security of clipless pedals, yet have the instant and predictable release needed in extreme conditions--all at an affordable price. Easy attachment; includes a strap that wraps over your arch using dynamic tension to lock your feet to the pedals. Crush-proof elastomeric polymer laminate keeps the strap open; just use natural foot rotation to lock your foot into position and reverse to release. Super-comfy 1 1/4 inch strap is impervious to water, mud and freezing temperatures for great all weather use. Recommended for shoe size 6-11 and works with most platform pedals.
short_description: Get the locked-in security of clipless pedals, yet have the instant and predictable release needed in extreme conditions--all at an affordable price.
